Class oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.RandomRobot

java.lang.Object
oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.RandomRobot
public class oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.RandomRobot extends Object
oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.RandomRobot is an implementation of a oliverl_dv22olt.robot2.Robot where every step is randomized between all possible steps.
Author:
Oliver Lundqvist

      public void move()
